directions: Blend avocado, white onion, cilantro, parsley, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, white balsamic vinegar, garlic, salt, and pepper in a blender until everything is thoroughly chopped. Stream olive oil into the avocado mixture while blending until the mixture is smooth and creamy.
ingredients: 1/2 white onion, cut into large chunks
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Cilantro-Avocado Chimichurri Sauce
